example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ارتفع) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM سعر) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN صفيحة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البنزين)))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السوق) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المحلية))) (NP-ADV-2 (NOUN_NUM 200) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC ليرة))))
